Text: Firstly, thank you for uploading this, but I do have a question.  I have downloaded several RAR files without any problem, but this one has several files with the RAR files and it won't extract correctly for me.  I was wondering what I needed to do in order to extract these files correctly? It shows several R** files with the archived files.

Nevermind! I sort of figured it out.  It's a Windows bug.  I just tried to open it and set it to open using WinRAR from my list of programs instead of using the web.  It took a bit to get it sorted but it's finally working.  Thanks again!
Why is episode 3 in .rar files? Eps 1,2 and 4 are normal avi files which are much easier to deal with especially burning to a disk.
